Posts.Content: They should be doing it with every physical...generally when they do a pap smear they check you all over since you are already down and undressed.
Posts.Title: Breast exams by family doctor

Posts.Content: Start with a mammogram and go from there. You can schedule yourself for one (without doctor orders) that will give you a baseline of where your breasts are at.
Posts.Title: lump on left areola and swollen armpit
